amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for housing counseling under section 106 of the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1968 by $6.7 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the funding (by transfer) for the Home Investment Partnerships Program account by $6,760,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
